meanings.definition: The stomach or abdomen, especially when large or distended.
meanings.sent1: After eating too much cake, his gorbelly was uncomfortable.
meanings.sent2: The bear's gorbelly was a result of hibernation.
meanings.sent3: The gorbelly of the balloon animal made it look comical.
meanings.sent4: The gorbelly of the ship was filled with cargo.
meanings.sent5: Her gorbelly shook with laughter at the joke.

meanings.definition: To swell or bulge out, as in a rounded shape.
meanings.sent1: The balloon began to gorbelly as it filled with air.
meanings.sent2: The frog's throat started to gorbelly before it croaked.
meanings.sent3: The cake batter started to gorbelly over the edges of the pan.
meanings.sent4: The river began to gorbelly after heavy rainfall.
meanings.sent5: The balloon animal's tail gorbellyed as it was twisted.

meanings.definition: A person or animal with a large, protruding belly.
meanings.sent1: The gorbelly of the man jiggled as he laughed.
meanings.sent2: The gorbelly of the pregnant cat was noticeable.
meanings.sent3: The gorbelly of the dog made it waddle comically.
meanings.sent4: The gorbelly of the pig was round and pink.
meanings.sent5: The gorbelly of the bear was a sign of a good harvest.
